ing: 1 (8.3 ounce) can citrus flavored energy drink (e.g. Red Bullâ„¢)
des: "This is a very simple strawberry smoothie. I learned the recipe from my friends who work at Mercer's cafe."
ins: In the container of a blender, combine the energy drink and frozen strawberries. Blend until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute. Add some water if blending is difficult. Pour into 2 big glasses.
